item.title: Word Power Made Easy
item.description: Introduction This is a note for a book named Word Power Made Easy. The words I learned from this book were summarized into the mind maps shown below. If you still struggled with the English words, I strongly recommend this book to you. It will refresh your idea about words, help you understand the prefix, root and suffix.
